pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, August 25, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, August 25, 2016:

Saguenay, Quebec

9:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus Summer meeting.

Delta Saguenay Hotel and Conference Centre
2675 Du Royaume Boulevard,
Saguenay, Quebec

Note for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 8:30 a.m.


11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the National Caucus Summer meeting.

Jonquière Room
Delta Saguenay Hotel and Conference Centre
2675 Du Royaume Boulevard,
Saguenay, Quebec

Note for media:

  • Open coverage


5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a community event.

Port area of Chicoutimi
49 La Fontaine Street,
Chicoutimi, Quebec

Note for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 5:00 p.m. (“Hangar du Vieux-Port de Chicoutimi” at the door in front of the fountain)


PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
